sentences.en: A juror must have an open mind.
sentences.cn: 陪审员一定不要有成见.

sentences.en: A spokeswoman for the Crown Prosecution Service confirmed that juror had been sent home on Thursday.
sentences.cn: 最后,奥勒里法官决定将那名女陪审员开除出陪审团,并于上周四将她遣送回家.

sentences.en: After writing scrip, the judge wants presiding juror to be scrip between jury ordinal deliver.
sentences.cn: 在写了纸条后, 法官要首席陪审员把纸条在陪审团间依次传递.

sentences.en: Female juror sees laugh into next satchel.
sentences.cn: 女陪审员看了看会心一笑然后放进了随身的挎包.

sentences.en: He sat through the trial as a standby juror.
sentences.cn: 他作为候补陪审员参加了审判的全过程。

sentences.en: In Jian after scrip, the judge wants presiding juror to be scrip between jury ordinal deliver.
sentences.cn: 在笕了纸条后, 法官要首席陪审员把纸条在陪审团间依次传递.

sentences.en: Is this where juror number 9 ate her lunch?
sentences.cn: 9号陪审员就是在这里吃午餐的?

sentences.en: Judge or juror who favour one of the parties in a case.
sentences.cn: 法官或陪审员偏袒诉讼案当事人中的一方.

sentences.en: Juror No. 10 , Richard Marsh , was for Cowperwood in a sentimental way.
sentences.cn: 第十位陪审员理查·马希, 是对柯帕乌有同情之感而袒护她的.

sentences.en: Juror No.3 stops struggling now and stares at No.8 and all the jurors watch in silence.
sentences.cn: 三号陪审员停止挣扎,怒目直视八号,所有陪审员都默默地注视着他.

sentences.en: Juror No.4 turns away sits silently in a chair.
sentences.cn: 四号陪审员转过身去,静静地坐在椅子里.

sentences.en: The foreman was asked by the clerk whether the jurors had reached verdicts on which they all agreed.
sentences.cn: 书记员问陪审团主席是不是陪审员们已作出了全体一致的裁决。

sentences.en: The law imposes upon each grand juror a strict obligation of secrecy.
sentences.cn: 法律赋予了大陪审团成员以严格的保密义务.

sentences.en: To serve as a juror would mean closing the store, and I can't afford that.
sentences.cn: 当陪审员就意味着要关店, 我承受不起.

sentences.en: When the judge demanded the note back, the juror refused. " It was, " he said , " a private matter. "
sentences.cn: 当法官要求把纸片交回时, 这个男陪审员严辞拒绝, “ 这是个人私事. ”

sentences.en: Why do we have only one alternate juror?
sentences.cn: 为什么只一名候补陪审员?

trans.tran_cn: 陪审员，审查委员，宣誓人，评委
